title: Someone Caught One Bert Show Member In An Awkward Position + Update: She's Going On A Romantic Getaway With The Man She Wants To Dump
description:
We had an event over the weekend that required us to wear special shirts. When Moe arrived, he was told his shirt was upstairs in the studio. However the shirt he attempted to put on wasn't the right size. And let's just say someone walked by and caught Moe in an awkward position!
Plus, we have an update from the listener who was considering dumping her boyfriend over the weekend.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
